data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Chao, Martens, Jochen (2018): Rediscovery of Lobonychiumpalpiplus Roewer, 1938 (Opiliones, Laniatores, Epedanidae) in Sabah, Malaysia. ZooKeys 785: 29-40, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.785.26389, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.785.26389
